Token.Abstract: Sensor that be used to create a new sensor during runtime and store data in it.
Init new sensor for this device.

Parameter.Name: dispName
Parameter.Abstract: Description of the sensor used to display name

Parameter.Name: devType
Parameter.Abstract: Device type that the sensor belongs to

Parameter.Name: datType
Parameter.Abstract: Data type of the values being stored in the sensor

Parameter.Name: fields
Parameter.Abstract: Dictionary that stores all the fields with values as a JSON object

Token.Abstract: Init new sensor for any device.

Parameter.Name: dispName
Parameter.Abstract: Description of the sensor used to display name

Parameter.Name: devType
Parameter.Abstract: Device type that the sensor belongs to

Parameter.Name: datType
Parameter.Abstract: Data type of the values being stored in the sensor

Parameter.Name: fields
Parameter.Abstract: Dictionary that stores all the fields with values as a JSON object

Token.Abstract: Store a value in the sensor.

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: The value to be stored, will be stored as a JSON string object. Can be anything.

Parameter.Name: timestamp
Parameter.Abstract: Seconds since 1970 timestamp that describes time the value was collected.
